entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 March 2023
